snippet: Day Two at the Australian Open features a two-time former champion with a renewed spring in her step, a hard-luck former finalist (times four) and a national hero who could be making his final appearance as a player in his native Australia....
lead_paragraph: Day Two at the Australian Open features a two-time former champion with a renewed spring in her step, a hard-luck former finalist (times four) and a national hero who could be making his final appearance as a player in his native Australia.

headline.print_headline: What to Watch on Tuesday at the Australian Open
headline.main: What to Watch on Tuesday at the Australian Open
